bibl.title: Alkman PMGF 1.45: A Reprise.
bibl.note: Re-states and elaborates the reasons previously advanced [IDEM, The Nature of Early Greek Lyric. Three Preliminary Studies = Phoenix. Supplementary Volumes. 21 (Toronto, 1987) pp. 71-72] for reading aÏta in Alkman, P.M.G.F. 1, 45.
bibl.seg: FOWLER Robert L., Alkman PMGF 1.45: A Reprise.

Re-states and elaborates the reasons previously advanced [IDEM, The Nature of Early Greek Lyric. Three Preliminary Studies = Phoenix. Supplementary Volumes. 21 (Toronto, 1987) pp. 71-72] for reading aÏta in Alkman, P.M.G.F. 1, 45.
